donor_name: MINISTRY  OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS & COOPERATION OF SPAIN
outputs.output_descr: Capacities of the public and private sector in selected LAC countries to understand, develop and maintain CDM projects are enhanced through the LCF and Carbon-2012 Projects. (Sectoral Market Mechanism Initiative LAC)

donor_name: MINISTRY  OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS & COOPERATION OF SPAIN
outputs.output_descr: This project aims to develop capacity building for territorial approach to address climate change through targeted multi sectorial advocacy, planning and management pipeline at national and subnational level, to facilitate the integration of adaptation into regional  and national development policies and strategies.

•	Output 1.4 Establishment of a LAC Regional Technical Facility for the Sustainable Energy for all Initiative (SE4ALL) has been included in the Project to support UNDP work in LAC in the effort of promoting the objectives of the Sustainable Energy for All (SE4ALL) in the region. The output activities will build upon the results achieved through the collaboration between UNDP and the IDB to kick off SE4ALL activities in LAC during 2012 and 2013.
•	SE4ALL principal objectives is to mobilize all stakeholders to take concrete action toward three critical objectives to be achieved by 2030: (1) ensuring universal access to modern energy services; (2) doubling the global rate of improvement in energy efficiency; and (3) doubling the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix.
•	Jointly with IDB, UNDP has mobilized the endorsement of 19 countries to the Sustainable Energy for All Initiative in the LAC region and a partnership has been established between our two institutions to support 16 countries in LAC in the preparation of their initial Rapid Assessments to establish the baseline situation and current energy development plans in each country.
•	The Project will seek to contribute, in partnership with IDB and other partners, to establishment of a LAC SE4ALL Regional Platform for LAC to offer technical services to participant countries in LAC.

project_descr: Promoting Climate Change Adaptation, Energy & Environment. Strengthened regional capacities to adapt to climate change and increase the use of renewable energy sources.
project_title: PROMOTING CLIMATE CHANGE ADAPTATION, ENERGY AND ENVIRONM
